    public abstract class AbstractExecutionGraphHandler<R extends ResponseBody,M extends JobMessageParameters>
extends AbstractRestHandler<RestfulGateway,EmptyRequestBody,R,M>
    Base class for all AccessExecutionGraph based REST handlers.

    • 方法详细资料

      • handleRequest

        protected java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<R> handleRequest(@Nonnull
                                                                  HandlerRequest<EmptyRequestBody,M> request,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  RestfulGateway gateway)
                                                           throws RestHandlerException
        从类复制的说明: AbstractRestHandler
        This method is called for every incoming request and returns a CompletableFuture containing a the response.

        Implementations may decide whether to throw RestHandlerExceptions or fail the returned CompletableFuture with a RestHandlerException.

        Failing the future with another exception type or throwing unchecked exceptions is regarded as an implementation error as it does not allow us to provide a meaningful HTTP status code. In this case a HttpResponseStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR will be returned.

        指定者:
        handleRequest 在类中 AbstractRestHandler<RestfulGateway,EmptyRequestBody,R extends ResponseBody,M extends JobMessageParameters>
        参数:
        request - request that should be handled
        gateway - leader gateway
        返回:
        future containing a handler response
        抛出:
        RestHandlerException - if the handling failed

      • handleRequest

        protected abstract R handleRequest(HandlerRequest<EmptyRequestBody,M> request,
                                   AccessExecutionGraph executionGraph)
                            throws RestHandlerException
        Called for each request after the corresponding AccessExecutionGraph has been retrieved from the ExecutionGraphCache.
        参数:
        request - for further information
        executionGraph - for which the handler was called
        返回:
        Response
        抛出:
        RestHandlerException - if the handler could not process the request
